### Organization

The *EAPP Focus Meeting* is organized by [Dirk Wulff](https://www.mpib-berlin.mpg.de/staff/dirk-wulff) (Max Planck Institute for Human Development), [Elisa Altgassen] [Elisa Altgassen](https://www.uni-ulm.de/in/psy-dia/team/elisa-altgassen/) (Ulm University), and [Ruben Arslan](https://rubenarslan.github.io/) (University of Witten-Herdecke).
